title: Business Innovation and Growth
description: Business innovation is accelerating, and the service sector is the fastest-growing sector of the economy. This course helps students prepare for careers as businesses transition to a service economy and help them identify career and entrepreneurial opportunities. Students gain understanding of the design and innovation approaches in businesses and the service industry. The course also addresses trends of businesses services getting digitized and technology-enabled for growth, productivity, and scalability. Credit not allowed for MGT 128 and MGT 128R. Prerequisites: upper-division standing.
